content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” el_class=”custom-header” css=”.vc_custom_1622137764721{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1623446304748{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

The Revenue Growth Platform

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1623089134623{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-image: url(https://wp.static-cdn-shsp.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/SharpSpring_Grey_BG-scaled.jpg?id=208605) !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″]

Qualify 2x More Leads, Faster

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”overflow //gradient-lt-dk-gray-with-ss-while-logo” css=”.vc_custom_1589928570441{margin-bottom: 9rem !important;padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1561135322185{margin-right: 10% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

See how Authenteq used SharpSpring to double their qualified leads and convert them to sales.

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1591894372220{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]

Identity verification SaaS company Authenteq was tired of wasting time chasing the wrong leads, and they’d had enough of trying to navigate an overpriced suite of tools that didn’t provide the reporting they needed. Ready for a change, they decided to give the SharpSpring platform a try.

Authenteq now easily identifies hot sales leads, has actionable metrics on what content is converting best, and has seen site traffic increase beyond their wildest expectations. In short, they’re pretty pleased with the results.

Check out our new case study on Authenteq and learn how SharpSpring marketing automation helped them:

  • Create new qualified leads and revive cold leads
  • Secure new legacy deals, adding millions of dollars to their pipeline
  • Save 100s of hours with lead scoring and workflows
  • And much more…

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”custom-testimonial”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” el_class=”js-btn-scroll-to btn-scroll-to”][vc_column]

Send it to me
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_js]JTNDc2NyaXB0JTNFJTBBJTBBJTI0JTI4ZG9jdW1lbnQlMjkucmVhZHklMjhmdW5jdGlvbiUyMCUyOCUyOSUyMCU3QiUwQSUyMCUyMCUyMCUyNCUyOCUyMmlmcmFtZSUyMiUyOS5hdHRyJTI4JTIyc2Nyb2xsaW5nJTIyJTJDJTIwJTIybm8lMjIlMjklM0IlMEElN0QlMjklM0IlMEElM0MlMkZzY3JpcHQlM0U=[/vc_raw_js][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Learn how one business used SharpSpring marketing automation to streamline its lead qualification process and re-engage cold leads—while increasing site traffic by 200%.
